result.title: Need help in debugging.
result.content:
Can anyone help me with this problem. This is my first problem in implementing graph of any kind. I tried it using dfs. My code is.

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

vector<bool> visited;
vector<vector<int> > graph;
vector<char> gender;

int dfs(int a)
{
    int x=1;
    visited[a] =true;
    for(vector<int>::iterator it = graph[a].begin();it!=graph[a].end();it++)
    {
        if(gender[a]==gender[*it])
            return 0;
        if(gender[*it]=='u')
        {
            if(gender[a]=='m')
                gender[*it]= 'f';
            else
                gender[*it]='m';
        }
        if(!visited[*it])
         x= dfs(*it);
    }
    return x;
}
int main()
{
    std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int jk = 1;jk<t+1;jk++)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        visited = vector<bool> (n,0);
        graph = vector<vector<int> > (n);
        gender = vector<char> (n,'u');
        for(int i = 0;i<m;i++)
        {
            int u,v;
            cin>>u>>v;
            u--;v--;
            graph[u].push_back(v);
            graph[v].push_back(u);
        }
        int ans=1;
        for(int i =0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(visited[i])
                continue;
            else
            {
                gender[i]='m';
                ans = ans and dfs(i);
            }
        }
        if(ans)
            cout<<"Scenario #"<<jk<<":"<<endl<<"No suspicious bugs found!"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"Scenario #"<<jk<<":"<<endl<<"Suspicious bugs found!"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

I am getting WA on spoj and I have no idea what I am doing wrong. Please help.
